attributes.additional_details: The very reason why we want the Government to help tackle Asian racism is simply because we want what everyone wants - to be able to walk in the streets without fear. We want our children to live their lives without having to experience racial slurs being thrown at them, and we want to be treated fairly and with respect. We want the world to recognise the unfair treatment that the Asian community is getting and we want the world to take action. Help end Asian racism.
attributes.background: Sadly it has become too normalised for many southeast/eastern Asians to be called "Ching-chong", "Corona Virus" and "Chinese Bat". But since the start of the pandemic Asian hate crimes has gone up and it is time for the government to take action and help tackle Asian hate crimes in the UK.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.  We understand you want action to tackle anti-Asian racism, but we're not sure exactly what steps you'd like the Government to take.  Discrimination and abuse on the grounds of race is already illegal.  
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
